page.title: 12ST. MARY'S FARM
page.content: { ANIMALS Mr Gough has got 102 dairy cows.25 in calf heiffers.47 other calves. His wife has about 35 hens. {HOURS OF WORK The hours of work depends on the time of year.Normally he works half past seven a.m to nine o clock at night. Milking starts at five in the morning. Cowmen works 5 a.m to 6.30 p.m.Men work nine hours a day but Mr Gough works 12 hours a day. { FAMILY. Mr Gough does not own the farm.He has 1 son who helps on the farm.His wife and two helpers also help on the farm. The farm was named after the Earl of Chichesters wife in the early 1900's. Mr Gough's father and grand father were both farmers before him.
